b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (14:53): profiles FAIL

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:02): Just need to make sure encoding programs give you a nice UI so you can choose some combination of "iPhone compatible" and "Maximum compression (not compatible with mobile devices)" etc, and then they encode all the versions and spit out the appropriate chunk of HTML to use
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:02): Surely that can't be hard to do
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (15:02): reads discussion about validation on public-html
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:03): "Surely that can't be hard to do" is more or loss what got us the state of the web today
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:03): Sure, but that's not going to stop me being sure about it
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:03): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: those piece will be even harder to keep together than keeping files and MIME types without parameters together
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (15:03): (It'll stop me being correct, of course)
